name: Крем-мыло Бархатные Ручки Для Меня и Моей Семьи жидкое, 1л
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Panthenol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Citric Acid, Cocamide DEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Pantolactone, Parfum, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Potassium Sorbate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer.
